thread.title: Prithviraj as a satellite TV operator
thread.title_full: Prithviraj as a satellite TV operator - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Prithviraj as a satellite TV operator
text:
After donning distinct roles in Ennu Ninte Moideen and Amar Akbar Anthony, superstar Prithviraj will be seen in a rustic role in Jijo Anthony's Darwinte Parinamam.
In the movie, he comes in as a simple village man, who is a satellite TV technician. "Prithviraj will be portraying a role that will see him in a completely different avatar. His makeover will be very different from what he has essayed so far. The movie itself is a simple family entertainer with a bit of drama, romance, comedy and suspense," says Jijo. KL10 Pathu fame actress Chandini Sreedharan will star opposite the actor. "The relationship between Prithiviraj and Chandini, who play a couple, is the key factor of the movie. They have an enviable romance in the film," he adds.
In the movie, Chemban Vinod will play the negative role of a don. "Chemban's role in the film is going to be a very interesting one. His character will be of a goon," adds the director. Prithviraj's next movie Anarkali is gearing up for release. He is also set to star in cinematographer Sujith Vaasudev's directorial debut James and Alice , which has Vedhika as the female lead.
